include.condition: !Skin.HasSetting(SafeMode) + ![substring(ListItem.Path,lastfm://) | substring(ListItem.Path,shout://) | substring(ListItem.Path,plugin://) | substring(ListItem.Path,special://) | substring(Container.FolderPath,lastfm://) | substring(Container.FolderPath,shout://) | substring(Container.FolderPath,plugin://) | substring(Container.FolderPath,addon://)]

Skin.HasSetting(SafeMode) | substring(ListItem.Path,lastfm://) | substring(ListItem.Path,shout://) | substring(ListItem.Path,plugin://) | substring(ListItem.Path,special://) | substring(Container.FolderPath,lastfm://) | substring(Container.FolderPath,shout://) | substring(Container.FolderPath,plugin://) | substring(Container.FolderPath,addon://)
